data.title: Saskatchewan Association of Rural Municipalities on LinkedIn: SARM is seeking a highly motivated individual for a part
data.meta_description: SARM is seeking a highly motivated individual for a part-time Administrative Assistant position. The position is needed for three to four full days perâ€¦
data.text:
WE ARE HIRING! TITLE: Receptionist/Client Comfort Employment type: full-time Small elder law, estate planning and probate law firm looking for a receptionist/client comfort person to further our core values of: Compassionate. Innovative. Strong. Dependable! Those duties include: 1. Greeting and seating clients; 2. Answering phone calls; 3. Scheduling and confirming appointments; 4. Maintaining the lobby and conference rooms; 5. Mailing and emailing documents to clients; and 6. Various duties related to the overall client experience. The ideal candidate will have these qualities: 1. Two years of reception/service industry experience; 2. Great attention to detail (this might be the most important of all); 3. Comfort working in a small team environment (i.e. not always a lot of people to hang out and talk with); 4. Easy travel to Shelby Township; 5. Personable (i.e. good client service qualities); 6. Great organizational skills and pride in their work; and 7. Works well with others Our goal has always been to create a law firm that provides excellent client service and also provides a safe, pleasant, fun, work environment that people look forward to coming to. If you're interested in that, and meet the criteria above, please send me a resume and letter of interest. DIRECTIONS TO APPLY: To apply for this position, send an email to careers@ssrlawoffice.com along with your resume. In the Subject line, type your last name in all caps followed by the title of this job. In the body of the email, include a letter of interest, providing the following information: Paragraph 1: Tell us what excites you the most about this position. Paragraph 2: Tell us why you are the person we should hire. Paragraph 3: Tell us which of these Core Values you are most aligned with, providing an example from your prior work experience. Paragraph 4: Whether you like chocolate or vanilla better. Looking forward to hearing from you!

SCAMMER ALERT!! ðŸš¨ *This person contacted me via text a few minutes ago* I do my research anytime I get a text or email! It's just a shame we can't get legitimate Job Offers without scammers preying on us! There's a special place for them that I won't mention* Description Good day, potential candidate! I am Mrs. Savannah Sanders from "Novocure Inc." I am reaching out in response to the approval of your resume on Indeed. We are interested in considering you for our available remote positions: -Customer Service Representative -Data Entry Clerk -Administrative Assistant These positions offer a competitive rate of $28 to $32.00 per hour. Please set up the Zoom app on your mobile device and connect with the Online-Interviewing Manager; Mrs. Ashley Manzo to initiate your interview. -Click the Contacts tab. -Click the add icon and select Invite a Zoom contact. -Enter the email address of the contact you want to add (novocure_ashleymanzo@post.com) -Click Invite and send a message. -Verification Code (TQSR273) Kindly connect at your earliest convenience. Targeted Person's Location CA, USA- 91740 Scammer Information Unknown Location Unknown Email 1(209) 251-2703 Unknown URL Scam Type Employment Learn More Business name Unknown Date Reported November 22, 2023 Scam ID 775409

Here are two more opportunities to join the SAIT FM Team! Archibus Administrator (IWMS/CAFM) https://lnkd.in/gjfcKd2y Executive Assistant https://lnkd.in/gJ58xwm3 A few things to know about us... 1. Our department culture is based on trust, trusting yourself and those around you 2. We move fast, like to get our hands dirty and believe there is no such thing as a dumb question 3. We believe in and follow SAIT's F.I.R.S.T principles - Fairness, Integrity, Respect, Safety and Transparency 4. We love what we do and take great pride in knowing that we get to help shape the form and function of the campus 5. Laughter is our daily vitamin
